pages.text: The Grimshade turns nearby Skeletons into Wither Skeletons, and Skulls (placed or dropped) into Wither Skulls, this also works for Candle Skulls. The flower also has a small chance to spawn Wither Roses in the affected area when activated.$(br2)This flower requires activation by right-clicking it with a $(l:hexalia:items/hex_focus)Hex Focus$().
